text: Phil Gordon (born April 18, 1951) is an American politician. He served as the 51st mayor of Phoenix, Arizona from 2004 to 2012. Gordon is a member of the Democratic Party. The former city councilman was elected mayor in the non- partisan mayoral race on September 9, 2003, garnering 72 percent of the vote, and re-elected on September 11, 2007, with 77 percent of the vote.SUMMARY OF MAYOR AND COUNCIL ELECTION SEPTEMBER 9, 2003 Phoenix Business Journal, September 2007Gordon sweeps mayor's race, sales tax increase passes - Topix == References == Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Jewish American politicians Category:Mayors of Phoenix, Arizona Category:Politicians from Chicago Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Phil Gordon (politician)
